My name is Prananda Ramadhan, you can call me Rama. I'm a Binus University graduates, Information System - Business Intelligence major, a fresh one.

Not actually fresh though. I'm graduated in 2013, doing freelance stuff since 2011. But, today and onwards, i want to extend my knowledge which i couldn't get from just being a freelancer, by joining a company or a startup whom had many experienced people who aim towards the better future.

In my sparetime, i'm learning English, Svenska, German, Arabic and Japanese. Being a polyglot is my another sidekick mission to fullfil my outrageous dream.
